name: Jewelry Bonney
text: Activate: Main [1]: You may rest this card: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may rest this card: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
